Description: Get your inner Queen out with this Killer combo! You are bidding on a long discontinued 90's Dillion V-series Brian May style Red Special Copy VBMQT & a Vintage Vox Cambridge 30 Reverb Twin V9320.Guitar is in excellent used condition with no major dings or dents .Some light scratches & swirl marks.Amp is in good used working condition with a more "road worn" appearance -Plenty of nicks scuffs & dings.Guitar plays well with smooth action and multiple switching options.Could probably benefit from a professional set up.Amp sounds great- Seems very loud for 30 watt Solid state / Tube amp combo. No International Bidders This is a no reserve auction -Happy Bidding! Free Local pickup preferred (Tube amps don't travel well) but will ship (will be expensive) at approx 50lbs .Recommend insurance if shipping.No case / cover or gig bag included but will be well packaged Guitar Specifications: Transparent Red Real maple AAAAA Quilt top Mahogany solid one piece tonewood body,Gloss finish Mahogany set neck…Gloss finish Thick Rosewood fingerboard, with abalone dot markers 24 medium jumbo frets, 24.75” scale Grover 18:1 wide-ratio tuners. Genuine Burns “Tri-Sonic" pick ups in all 3 positions 2 point vibrato, with custom Brian May style bar 1 volume, 1 tone control, with custom knobs & Brian May style switching for pickup on/off and in/out of phase tones Amp specs: 1999-2000 VOX Cambridge 30 Reverb TwinOutput Power30 WattsTubesOne 12AX7 preamp for second channelReverbSpringChannel OneOne Input (Common to both channels), one volume, one bass, one trebleChannel TwoOne Input (Common to both channels), one gain control, one gain switch, one treble, one Mid Range (MRB) Boost switch, one bass, one volume, one tremolo speed, one tremolo depth,one reverb control, one footswitch jackSpeaker(s)2 VOX Custom Celestion Bulldog 10″ Heavy Duty speaker
Title: DILLION / VOX BRIAN MAY RED SPECIAL COMBO  BOHEMIAN RHAPSODY INNER KILLER QUEEN!
